      • canvas

        private com.jogamp.newt.awt.NewtCanvasAWT canvas
        Because of problems with the computers in the ExWi pool, we are using GLCanvas, which is based on AWT, instead of GLJPanel, which is based on Swing.

    • Method Detail

      • getCanvas

        public final java.awt.Component getCanvas()
        Return the AWT component that contains the rendered image. The user application needs to call this. The returned component is usually added to an application window.
        Specified by:
        getCanvas in interface RenderPanel

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        May be overwritten by the user to clean up.

      • waitGetPoses

        public void waitGetPoses()
        Wait and get 3D tracking poses (HMD and controllers) from OpenVR. Needs to be called before rendering and passing the rendered image to the OpenVR compositor.

        public void prepareDisplay()
